questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'She has never _______ (swim) in the ocean.'
Spot the mistake: 'They have already ate.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'She sings beautifully.'
Fill in the blank: 'He _______ (begin) his new job last week.'
Spot the mistake: 'She has gone to the store, she will be back shorty.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'The teacher gives the students homework.'
questions.answer: The teacher gave the students homework.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'I have never _______ (break) a bone.'
Spot the mistake: 'They have drank all the water.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'She writes a letter.'
Fill in the blank: 'I have _______ (choose) the red dress for the party.'
Spot the mistake: 'He has draw a beautiful painting.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'I read the news.'
Fill in the blank: 'By the time we arrived, the movie had already _______ (begin).'
Spot the mistake: 'I have wrote a letter to my parents.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'They come to visit us often.'
questions.answer: They came to visit us often.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The story _______ (begin) interestingly.'
Spot the mistake: 'I have never ate sushi.'
Change the sentence to past tense: 'She usually wears a hat.'
